question: In which year the famous Battle of Samel around Ajmer took place?
explanation: Sher Shah Suri Led many campaigns in RajasthanÂ  against Marwar, Ranthambhore, Nagor, Ajmer, Jodhpur, and Bikaner. He also defeated Maldeo in the famous Battle of Samel around Ajmer which took place in 1544 A.D.
